title: Little Mouse
author: Little Mouse
created_time: August 19, 2023, 02:49:12 PMLast edit: August 25, 2023, 01:08:40 PM by Little Mouse
content: 1.   No alt account is allowed. If you are found cheating, will be kicked out with no pay.2. Must join Fitcoin telegram channel.3. Must join LM bounty telegram group. If anyone asks bounty-related questions in the Fitcoin telegram group, they will be disqualified.4. Must post the weekly report on this thread.5. Create a different post each week for submitting the bounty report.6. Week will start on Saturday (19.08.23)7. Create a post for Authentication with the below format.Bitcointalk Username:Joined Campaigns:Telegram Username:Your ERC20 address: The bounty pool is limited to 200k $FPC. However, it also depends on the total sale. The reward in general is 5% of the total coin sold in the crowdsale.The reward will be distributed based on the total accumulated stakes. Here's the pool for the individual categories-1. Twitter - 20%2. Facebook - 10%3. Blog- 20%4. Video- 20%5. Reddit- 10%6. Signature- 20%1.   Must follow @Fitcoin on Twitter.2.   Must Like and Retweet 3 tweets each week from the official Twitter.3.   Create 2 organic tweets with the following hashtags (No copy-paste from others.)4.   Must mention @Fitcoin and share the link- https://powerfitcoin.com/tokensale/5. If there are not enough posts from the official account, just create 2 organic tweets of your own.6. Hashtags- #fitcoin #crowdsale #tokensale #ico #cryptocurrencyRewards:500-4999 Followers- 1 stake5000+ Followers- 3 stakeAPPLY HERE1.   Must like and follow the official Facebook page @Fitcoin (Link will be added soon)2.   Must Like and share 3 posts each week from the official Facebook page.3.   Your profile must be public.4.   Create 2 organic posts with the following hashtags (No copy-paste from others.)5. If there are not enough posts from the official account, just create 2 organic tweets of your own.6. Hashtags- #fitcoin #crowdsale #tokensale #ico #cryptocurrencyRewards:500-2999 Followers- 1 stake3000+ Followers- 3 stakeAPPLY HERE1. Create a video on Fitcoin (1 video per person)2. Post it on youtube (only youtube allowed)3. Your channel must be 3 months old and must have 100 subscribers.4. Video must be a minimum of 2 minutes.5. In the description, put your address.Rewards:Will be decided based on the quality, views, and engagement.APPLY HERE1. Write an article on Fitcoin (1 article per person)2. Post it on Medium, steemit, and personal crypto blog (no free domain like blogspot, wix, etc accepted).3. Article must have at least 500 words and some links to the Fitcoin Website.Rewards:Will be decided based on the quality, views, and engagement.APPLY HEREThe details about reddit campaign will be posted later. In case, reddit campaign is not activated, the pool will be added to facebook campaign.1.   Wear Signature, avatar, and personal text.2.   Must write 10 posts per week.3.   Bounty report and/or post in the bounty/signature thread won't be counted toward the weekly posts.4.   Must be active on 4 different days of the week. (3 posts/day is accepted maximum).5.   This campaign will be available for only member and above.Rewards:Member- 1 stake per weekFull Member- 3 stakes per weekSenior Member- 6 stakes per weekHero/Legendary- 10 stakes per weekAPPLY HEREMaster Spreadsheet
